Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles how the game runs.
    Version:
    06/21/2017
    Author:
    Phillip Sturtevant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(MainMenu menuInput)
      Constructs a new game with the saved data selected from the main menu

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts the game

      • battleshipSetup

        public void battleshipSetup(int playerNum,
                            int numberOfShips)
        Creates a setup Battleship window when the game starts.
        Parameters:
        playerNum - the Player/Computer identifying number
        numberOfShips - the number of Battleships in the game

      • turnUpdate

        public void turnUpdate(BattleshipWorld player1,
                       BattleshipWorld player2,
                       Computer compPlayer)
        Main game loop where Players take turns.
        Parameters:
        player1 - Player 1's Battleship world
        player2 - Computer/Player 2's Battleship world
        compPlayer - the Computer Player

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(int score1,
                        int score2,
                        BattleshipWorld player1,
                        BattleshipWorld player2)
        Updates the score of each Player to the score window.
        Parameters:
        score1 - Player 1's current score
        score2 - Computer/Player 2's current score
        player1 - Player 1's Battleship world
        player2 - Computer/Player 2's Battleship world

      • runTurn

        public int runTurn(BattleshipWorld player,
                   int score,
                   int playerNum,
                   Computer compPlayer)
        Runs the turn for a single Player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player's Battleship world
        score - the current Player score
        playerNum - the identifying Player/Computer number
        compPlayer - the Computer Player
        Returns:
        the updated score of the Player at the end of the turn

      • doubleClick

        public boolean doubleClick(java.util.ArrayList<Location> pastClickLocations,
                           Location clickLocation)
        Checks if the Player clicked same location twice in the same game.
        Parameters:
        pastClickLocations - a list of the Player's click locations
        clickLocation - the click location to compare against previous clicks
        Returns:
        true if Player clicked the same square, false if the Player clicked a new square

      • pauseProgram

        public void pauseProgram(int sleepTimer)
        Pauses the game.
        Parameters:
        sleepTimer - The length of time the program will pause (in milliseconds)
